./.title: Welcome
./.body:
Eltron WordPress Theme Documentation
This is documentation for Eltron WordPress theme.
I would like to thank you for purchasing the theme.

This theme is developed by Bolvo.com
Lets get started...

important.html.title: Important
important.html.body:
Introduction
Steps to get help

Please check for the solution in appropriate page on This document, if not found please check on FAQ page on bottom of this page.
Please check online version of this document here, there are chances I have updated it after you downloaded the theme.
Please browse/search here for more how-to:  https://kb.bolvo.com/ ( There is not much content for now, but it will be added in future.)
Create ticket https://bolvo.com/support/ (Do not forget to provide your themeforest purchase key for speedy reply. )

Thanks so much in advance for cooperation!
Best Practice to customize theme
Few style changes: If you only want to do few style changes, I suggest you to use Custom Css box in Appearance / Customise / Additional CSS. (this will override all other styles and it saves in database so it stays even if you update the theme)
Heavy style modifications: If you want to do heavy style modifications, I suggest you to use child theme instead. A blank simple child theme is supplied with your download in Resources folder. Just put your styles in style.css file of child theme.
Heavy customization: In case you are a developer and want to do heavy customization, again I suggest you use  child theme. You can read more about child theme, here https://codex.wordpress.org/Child_Themes(Blank child theme is supplied with your Themeforest All Files Download.)

installation.html.title: Installation
installation.html.body:
Installation
I assume you already know how to install WordPress, many Web-hosts provide 1-Click interface to install one of the Most popular CMS today, WordPress!
For detailed WordPress installation instructions visit http://codex.wordpress.org/Installing_WordPress


Check out this Youtube video for Demo site installation https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zqmgi_vOuAs  (This video might be for other theme, but the installation process is exactly same)

Uploading Eltron Theme
Before moving to installation, we first need to upload theme to WordPress. (Assuming you are logged into wp-admin already at this point). Here is what to do next...

Download theme from Themeforest. Please download All Files and Documentation and Not Installable WordPress files only.
Unzip that folder on your local PC/Mac
Inside that folder, you will find a zip eltron.zip around  6MB-12MB of size. (this is the WordPress theme)
Go to your wp-admin dashboard, then go to Appearance -> Themes -> Add new, and upload eltron.zip, and then activate the theme.
Immediately skip to below section please.

Installing Eltron Theme
The theme comes with 1-Click installer and demo setup, you only need to follow below simple instructions.

As soon as you activate the theme, you will be forwarded to install few plugins, please install theme, and then activate them. (refer image 1 below)
Click on Dashboard link on Left bar, on the top. (We do this to trigger the plugins we just activated)
Go to Theme Options > Welcome (If you dont see this link, all required plugins are not activated yet then.) (refer image 3 below)
Follow easy on-screen instructions.
Thats it !


Note: If for some reason, menus does not get assigned automatically, please go to wp-admin/Appearance->Menus to assign menu. (refer image 4 below)
If Home or Blog page is not setup automatically, you can set them by going to wp-admin/Appearance/Reading.
The above process is automatic and thus is technical. There are chances things might go wrong depending on your server's technical settings. Feel free to contact us if you have any trouble.
Now you should have Theme installed and setup just like demo. Now lets see how to edit things to match theme to your business.
Please also check FAQ section below for more answers.
Image 1 (referred above)
Image 3 (referred above)
Image 4 (referred above)

page_builder.html.title: Page Builder Introduction
page_builder.html.body:
Page Builder Introduction
This theme is created with Popular Elementor Page Builder. Theme comes with over 50 custom modules as well. Its easy and fun to customise the website to your requirements.
Find out more about that plugin here https://elementor.com/
Here is quick start guide...

To create/edit a page.. Log in as admin and Go to Pages ( add new or edit ) and then click Edit with Elementor. Or you can also click Edit with Elementor from Top admin bar from front page if you are logged in as admin.(as shown below)


Note: If you need, Documentation for the plugin can be found here https://elementor.com/support/

creating-a-page.html.title: Creating a page
creating-a-page.html.body:
Creating a page
If you imported the demo content, you can skip this section and move to page below titled " Editing a page ".
This guide involves the steps in case you do not want to import the Demo pages and want to start scratch.
So here is step by step guild to build the page.
After you finish installation, you must have Eltron theme, Eltron features and Elementor page builder plugin active.
Step 1) Go to Pages / Add new and create a new page, Make sure Elementor full width template is selected.

Step 2) Locate section  on left Eltron Home and drag the needed widget to the page.

Step 3) Modify the information.

Step 4) Also modify the images as needed from left panel.

modifying-a-page.html.title: Modifying a page
modifying-a-page.html.body:
Modifying a Page
If you imported the Demo. You will see the pages already in in your WordPress install as seen on the Demo website.
Here is step by step guide to modify those pages to your needs.
Step 1: Edit a page using Elementor.

Step 2: Click on the section you want to edit, then on left you will see panel to edit.

main_menu/header.html.title: Header / Logo
main_menu/header.html.body:
Header
To customise the default header, please go to Default customiser of WordPress. There you will find options to change header stuff. For example, here are the steps to change the logo.
You can click on Logo tab to edit the logo image.

There are also other options on the bottom that you can use to build your own header your own way.

main_menu.html.title: Main Menu
main_menu.html.body:
Menu
If importing went successful, you will see menu already. To Setup menu as per your need, please go through these steps:

Go to Appearance > Menus. You can edit or create your own menu and assign items to it.   

If you are totally new to WordPress, there are plenty of videos of Youtube you can refer to know more about WordPress menus.

If you need help, please contact support .

sidebar.html.title: Sidebar / Widgets
sidebar.html.body:
Sidebar & Widgets Management.
In this theme, you can choose to have sidebar.
To put Widgets in sidebar, please go to Appearance / Widgets and drag Widgets of your choice to Default Sidebar Widget area.

footer.html.title: Footer
footer.html.body:
Footer
Just like Header, the footer can also be customised using Appearance/customise.

Once you click Footer tab, a panel will appear where you can edit the footer widget width and extreme bottom footer elements.
You have choice to display default, 1, 2, 3, 4 columns in footer widgets.


Now you can use the default Footer columns found in Appearance/Widgets to put widgets in footer.

editing-contact-forms.html.title: Editing Contact forms
editing-contact-forms.html.body:
Editing Forms
Eltron theme comes with some forms that you can use to collect information from clients.
By default - We use popular Contact form 7 plugin. Because it provides full flexibility. However you are free to use your own choice of plugin if you want to. And just use that plugin's shortcode instead. ( As seen below )

The blue background bar code in above screenshot, is the Shortcode that plugin provides you, in order to use this form anywhere on  any page. Almost every form plugins in WordPress ecosystem provides shortcode. So if you use any other plugin, you can still grab the shortcode provided and paste it on the Shortcode area on left panel when editing the page with form.

translation.html.title: Translation
translation.html.body:
Translation
The theme is translation ready and its very easy to translate it in your desired language. 
Here are the steps.
1) Go to wp-admin/settings/general/ and Select your language.

2) Install and activate this plugin https://wordpress.org/plugins/loco-translate/ ( I am assuming you know how to install plugins, if you do not, please Google it. )
3) Once plugin is activated, you will find a new menu on left. Please go to Loco Translate -> Manage translations, and click on New language link of eltron theme. (Please disregard theme name in following screenshot, it was built for another theme. You can still follow the same steps.)

4) On next page, select your language, and click Start translating, on next page you will see list of all available strings and a box to enter their translation.

Note that there are over 1000 strings, but you do not need to translate all of them, most of them are being used in Admin panel like in themeoptions etc and can be ignored as front user never see them.
So its recommended that you go through the front website and find and translate terms as needed. There should be under 100 strings that are required.
Once Saved in last step, if you do not see Green bar, and see some permission problems in saving data instead, then please contact your host about it, as its server file permission problem.

theme_updates.html.title: Theme Updates
theme_updates.html.body:
Theme Updates
Note : Its always recommended to backup your Website, Theme, Database before updating. You can use this updraftplus plugin to have regular backups of your Website.
Updating the theme is very easy.
You can go to Appearance / Themes and you will see a notification to update theme if you have entered a valid purchase code in Themeoptions/Welcome screen.
After updating the theme, just go to Appearance->plugins to update all plugins to their latest versions.
